transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan. Alok Patil Developer and Builders.
Executive: Haan, boliye. Yes ma'am, good morning. Main Riya bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan. Ma'am aapko kuch issue tha ki aapko leads vagaira mein kuch issue aa raha hai, aapke system pe leads nahi dikh rahi hai, right?
Customer: Haan aur hume hamara jo website hai na, wo bhi update karwana hai.
Executive: Achha achha, website update karana hai ka matlab?
Customer: Matlab jo bhi information meri hai na abhi system mein, to wo update karani hai.
Executive: Achha achha, to aap hi karengi?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aap mujhe bataiye kaise karengi aap ye? Matlab main yaha pe online aapko guide kar deti hu. Guide kar deti hu.
Customer: Matlab abhi laptop pe kar rahi hu.
Executive: Haan haan, laptop ki hi main baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Haan. Aapke system pe ye wali mail ID hai ma'am, ek second PSP3986@gmail.com wali?
Customer: Kya ma'am?
Executive: Aapke laptop pe wo PS wali mail ID hai? Ek second.
Customer: Haan PS wali hai na. Haan, to dekhiye ispe aapko abhi turant Riya IndiaMART karke ek mail gaya hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To wo open kariye. Fir join with Google meeting, meeting with IndiaMART team. Kiya haan, usko join kariye.
Customer: Ek minute haan. Haan ji.
Customer: Kiya.
Executive: Ab usi pe baat kar sakte hai kya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji ma'am, isko hum left kar dete hai and isi pe baat karte hai, thik hai? Voice on kar lijiye.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with leads.

- Wants to update the website.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide customer online.

- Asked customer to join Google Meet.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, website update, google meet
